scripts.all-tests: npm run parallel-tests && jasmine && npm run redeploy-test
scripts.compile-all: npm run compile-iam && npm run compile-db && npm run compile-app
scripts.compile-app: kes cf compile --kes-folder app --region us-east-1 --deployment $DEPLOYMENT --template node_modules/@cumulus/deployment/app --profile $AWS_PROFILE --cf-file ./overrides/app/cloudformation.template.yml
scripts.compile-iam: kes cf compile --kes-folder app --region us-east-1 --deployment $DEPLOYMENT --template node_modules/@cumulus/deployment/iam --profile $AWS_PROFILE
scripts.compile-db: kes cf compile --kes-folder app --region us-east-1 --deployment $DEPLOYMENT --template node_modules/@cumulus/deployment/db  --profile $AWS_PROFILE
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-iam && npm run deploy-db && npm run deploy-app
scripts.deploy-app: kes cf deploy --kes-folder app --region us-east-1 --deployment $DEPLOYMENT --template node_modules/@cumulus/deployment/app --profile $AWS_PROFILE --cf-file ./overrides/app/cloudformation.template.yml
scripts.deploy-iam: kes cf deploy --kes-folder app --region us-east-1 --deployment $DEPLOYMENT --template node_modules/@cumulus/deployment/iam  --profile $AWS_PROFILE
scripts.deploy-db: kes cf deploy --kes-folder app --region us-east-1 --deployment $DEPLOYMENT --template node_modules/@cumulus/deployment/db  --profile $AWS_PROFILE
scripts.prepare: for x in lambdas/*; do (cd $x && zip lambda.zip index.js); done
